10.speaker: speaker_unknown
10.dialogue: W-what is that?! That girl… Is she some kind of monster?!

20.speaker: speaker_unknown
20.dialogue: That’s… That’s the Twilight Star! She’s going to destroy the entire city! W-what do we do?!

30.speaker: speaker_unknown
30.dialogue: Wait… Who are those…?

40.speaker: speaker_unknown
40.dialogue: Are those people fighting her?

50.speaker: speaker_unknown
50.dialogue: Are they… trying to save us…? They’re… incredible!

60.speaker: speaker_kaisa
60.dialogue: Ugh…

70.speaker: speaker_kaisa
70.dialogue: That vision again… Why is it happening so often, lately?

80.speaker: speaker_kaisa
80.dialogue: …Ah, no sense dwelling on it now.

90.speaker: speaker_ina
90.dialogue: **AGGRESSIVE CHEEP!**

100.speaker: speaker_kaisa
100.dialogue: Ugh, so loud! Ina, why?!

110.speaker: speaker_ina
110.dialogue: […Oh, you’re awake! Perfect! Remember, there are only a few weeks left before the school year starts.]

120.speaker: speaker_kaisa
120.dialogue: Don’t remind me.

130.speaker: speaker_ina
130.dialogue: [I will absolutely remind you, bunny! We still have to finish your Star Guardian training!]

140.speaker: speaker_ina
140.dialogue: [Only a few lessons left to go before you're ready to protect the universe! Yay!]

150.speaker: speaker_kaisa
150.dialogue: So loud… So early… Ina, please…

160.speaker: speaker_ina
160.dialogue: [“Ina, please start my training right now?” Sure thing, bunny! Let’s begin with some trivia.]

170.speaker: speaker_kaisa
170.dialogue: Fine. I… guess some morning training couldn’t hurt.

180.speaker: speaker_ina
180.dialogue: [Perfect! Choose the response you think fits best, and I’ll respond in kind. Don’t worry, there are no wrong answers! Be yourself!]

190.speaker: speaker_ina

response.dialogue: To protect the world from darkness!
To fight for my friends!
I’m going back to bed.

190.dialogue: [What is the job of a Star Guardian?]

200a_20.speaker: speaker_ina
200a_20.dialogue: [Although… it's been a while since anything bad happened.]

200a_30.speaker: speaker_ina
200a_30.dialogue: [But that’s no reason to start slacking off!]

200b_20.speaker: speaker_ina
200b_20.dialogue: [Your friends are your greatest strength! Well, besides the First Star.]

200b_30.speaker: speaker_ina
200b_30.dialogue: [So treat them all well, and keep them safe!]

200c_30.speaker: speaker_ina
200c_30.dialogue: [Y-you can’t do that! It’s against the rules! Hey, wake up! Hey! HEY!!!]

200c_40.speaker: speaker_kaisa
200c_40.dialogue: I’m kidding, Ina. Jeez, stop yelling.

210.speaker: speaker_kaisa
210.dialogue: Right, I think I’ve got it.

220.speaker: speaker_kaisa
220.dialogue: What’s next? Can we move to combat training?

230.speaker: speaker_ina
230.dialogue: [You sure do like fighting! But first, let's talk about navigation. Being a strong fighter is useless if you can’t get to the battle in time!]

240.speaker: speaker_ina
240.dialogue: [Your star phone has a special interface, updated by yours truly. Let's take a look now.]

10.speaker: speaker_unknown
10.dialogue: [It’s just like before…]

20.speaker: speaker_unknown
20.dialogue: [Back when… everything changed…]

30.speaker: speaker_zoe
30.dialogue: Back when this happened?!

40.speaker: speaker_zoe
40.dialogue: I had so much fun! All those people, gone forever! And you were right in the middle of it!

50.speaker: speaker_zoe
50.dialogue: What’s wrong? You don’t want to remember!? Well, too bad!

60.speaker: speaker_zoe
60.dialogue: You couldn’t do anything to save the city then! And you can’t do anything now!

70.speaker: speaker_zoe
70.dialogue: I see you, Kai’Sa! You can never hide from me!

80.speaker: speaker_zoe
80.dialogue: I SEE YOU, KAI’SA! KAI’SA!

90.speaker: speaker_unknown
90.dialogue: Kai’Sa? Kai’Sa! Stop daydreaming, we’re trying to train!

100.speaker: speaker_kaisa
100.dialogue: Oh… sorry, I forgot where I was for a second.

110.speaker: speaker_akali
110.dialogue: Forgot!? You made us come out here, Kai! This isn’t exactly where I want to be on the last day of spring vacation!

120.speaker: speaker_akali

response.dialogue: You’ll be glad we trained if monsters attack.
Video games won’t help you in a life-or-death situation, Akali.
You haven’t named a single one of your special attacks! This team is shameful.

120.dialogue: I thought I would spend every day at the arcade…! So cruel.

130.speaker: speaker_akali
130.dialogue: Pff, whatever. Nothing’s attacked this city since we took the oath.

140.speaker: speaker_akali
140.dialogue: Which is fine by me, thanks for asking. I’d rather not relive last year!

150.speaker: speaker_ekko
150.dialogue: It’s better to be prepared, ‘Kali. Plus I can test out my powers on old stop signs.

160.speaker: speaker_kaisa
160.dialogue: More testing, huh? Is that what you do when you skip training?

170.speaker: speaker_ekko
170.dialogue: Hm. I’m sure I have no idea what you’re talking about… captain.

190.speaker: speaker_chiizu
190.dialogue: Sona says you can do it, Ekko! Believe in yourself!

210.speaker: speaker_chiizu
210.dialogue: Ahhh! I’m sorry! I didn’t mean to editorialize!

220.speaker: speaker_kaisa
220.dialogue: Heh. This team’s lively as ever.

230.speaker: speaker_chiizu
230.dialogue: She’s gone mad with rage! Every mouse for themselves!

240.speaker: speaker_ekko
240.dialogue: Sona! You’re not supposed to hit your familiar like that! You have to go for their center of mass!

260.speaker: speaker_kaisa
260.dialogue: One day, that mouse is really gonna get it.

270.speaker: speaker_taliyah
270.dialogue: Captain! I’m pumped from training and can’t wait to sock a big monster right in its monster face!

280.speaker: speaker_kaisa
280.dialogue: Good to hear, Taliyah. By the way… you act really differently when you wear that uniform. It’s refreshing.

290.speaker: speaker_taliyah
290.dialogue: Thanks! I feel more like myself in the outfit.

300.speaker: speaker_taliyah
300.dialogue: Star power! Chu chu!

310.speaker: speaker_akali
310.dialogue: Hey, Tali. Sona’s about to fight her own mouse.

320.speaker: speaker_taliyah
320.dialogue: What?! The battle of the titans is happening?! Two enter, one leaves?! Oh, I can’t miss this!

330.speaker: speaker_akali
330.dialogue: Go get ‘em, tiger.

340.speaker: speaker_akali

response.dialogue: It’s nothing. Don’t worry about it.
I was thinking about last year…
Who would win in a fight, me or a big robot made of smaller robots?

340.dialogue: …You’re sure you’re okay, Kai? You looked kinda pale for a minute. Need to talk?

350a_20.speaker: speaker_akali
350a_20.dialogue: Well, no use worrying about it then!

350a_30.speaker: speaker_akali
350a_30.dialogue: If you wanna talk about it later, though… All you have to do is ask. I’m always here for you.

350b_20.speaker: speaker_akali
350b_20.dialogue: It’s tough. We’re all still… processing. Kind of crazy how fast they rebuilt the damaged parts of the city, though.

350b_30.speaker: speaker_kaisa
350b_30.dialogue: Sometimes, I remember all those people, and… Ugh, well, you know. You were there, too.

350c_10.speaker: speaker_akali
350c_10.dialogue: How big is the robot? If it’s a really big robot, the robot wins. If it’s a slightly smaller robot… 50/50.

350c_20.speaker: speaker_akali
350c_20.dialogue: Or… Hmm… In that mecha show, the big train robot beat up a dinosaur. Can you beat up a dinosaur? I’m not so sure.

360.speaker: speaker_akali
360.dialogue: Actually, Kai… I did want to ask you something…

370.speaker: speaker_akali
370.dialogue: Now that people know about the guardians… or, the old ones—not us, obviously, since we haven’t done anything yet…

380.speaker: speaker_akali
380.dialogue: How long before this all ends? All of us, out here, having fun together?

390.speaker: speaker_akali
390.dialogue: What if Zoe comes back? Or something even worse? What happened to the other guardians won’t happen to us… will it?

400.speaker: speaker_taliyah
400.dialogue: Uh-oh, the sun’s starting to go down! Get back up there, sun!

410.speaker: speaker_taliyah
410.dialogue: Team? The sun isn’t listening to me. Should we call it?

420.speaker: speaker_ekko
420.dialogue: Seems like the right move. I have to get back to my… uh… Well, I gotta get back.

430.speaker: speaker_ekko
430.dialogue: Hey, Sona. And Sona’s mouse… thing. What do you think? Training over?

450.speaker: speaker_chiizu
450.dialogue: She says she’ll race you down the hill! And that you know what my name is!

470.speaker: speaker_chiizu
470.dialogue: …What? OH, NO! IS THAT NOT WHAT YOU SAID?!

480.speaker: speaker_chiizu
480.dialogue: MISS SONA, PLEASE! I’M A FACET OF YOUR SUBCONSCIOUS! MISS SONA! AAAAHHHHH!

490.speaker: speaker_taliyah
490.dialogue: Hey, no fair! That’s a huge head start!

510.speaker: speaker_kaisa
510.dialogue: Kids, huh?

520.speaker: speaker_akali
520.dialogue: Aren’t you all the same age?

530.speaker: speaker_ekko
530.dialogue: It’s a mindset, ‘Kali. That’s why I’m the genius inventor, and they’re all a bunch of goofy kids. As out of touch second years, I don’t expect you to understand.

540.speaker: speaker_akali
540.dialogue: Yesterday, you spent a hundred dollars entering a fighting game tournament and got last place.

550.speaker: speaker_ekko
550.dialogue: Wow! Wow! I do not recall that experience!

560.speaker: speaker_ekko
560.dialogue: I’m so offended that I need to leave this discussion immediately. Bye!

570.speaker: speaker_akali
570.dialogue: Hey, wait!

580.speaker: speaker_akali
580.dialogue: Pff, the second I showed him up...

590.speaker: speaker_kaisa
590.dialogue: At least they’re punctual about something. Come on. We should head out too. I don’t want to run into those middle-aged joggers again.

600.speaker: speaker_akali
600.dialogue: Ugh, good call. Their wraparound sunglasses are… not attractive.

610.speaker: speaker_akali
610.dialogue: Anyway, Kai… I didn’t get to finish my thought.

620.speaker: speaker_akali
620.dialogue: …Do you really think monsters will attack the city again? We haven’t seen any in… well, since the Battle of the Twilight Star.

630.speaker: speaker_kaisa

response.dialogue: It’s hard to say.
No use thinking about it now.
What about a small robot made of bigger robots? Could I beat that?

630.dialogue: Hm? Oh… right…

640a_10.speaker: speaker_kaisa
640a_10.dialogue: I wish I had a better answer.

640a_20.speaker: speaker_kaisa
640a_20.dialogue: If they do… we just have to be ready.

640b_10.speaker: speaker_kaisa
640b_10.dialogue: Just assume we’ll have to fight at some point, Kali.

640b_20.speaker: speaker_kaisa
640b_20.dialogue: If we’re lucky, it’ll be against some small fry.

640c_20.speaker: speaker_akali
640c_20.dialogue: Hey, come on. Stop joking around.

650.speaker: speaker_kaisa
650.dialogue: Sigh… I wish the old guardians would come back. They would know what to do.

660.speaker: speaker_akali
660.dialogue: Kai…

670.speaker: speaker_kaisa
670.dialogue: Hey, it’s alright! Whatever happens, we have each other! Star Guardians stick together. That’s our whole thing.

680.speaker: speaker_akali
680.dialogue: Yeah, I know. I know! Guardians forever, best friends for life.

690.speaker: speaker_kaisa
690.dialogue: Best friends for life!

700.speaker: speaker_kaisa
700.dialogue: And nothing will ever change that. Not monsters, not being Star Guardians, nothing. No matter what.

710.speaker: speaker_akali
710.dialogue: …No matter what, huh?

730.speaker: speaker_kaisa
730.dialogue: No matter what.

10.speaker: speaker_unknown
10.dialogue: Ah… Akali…

20.speaker: speaker_unknown
20.dialogue: It’s… so… hea… vy… Akali…

30.speaker: speaker_kaisa
30.dialogue: …Ugh, It feels like I’ve been in school for a thousand years.

40.speaker: speaker_kaisa
40.dialogue: How did we get Instructor Puboe for homeroom? It’s like I’m in prison.

50.speaker: speaker_akali
50.dialogue: I dunno. I think I could take him.

60.speaker: speaker_akali
60.dialogue: Transform into a Star Guardian. Throw, like, a hundred knives. And then I’d say something cool, like, um...

70.speaker: speaker_akali
70.dialogue: “Take that, Puboe! You’ll never assign six-page essays on a Friday again!”

80.speaker: speaker_akali

response.dialogue: Don’t joke about using your powers like that.
We can’t transform to hurt civilians. Even a villain like Puboe.
…And then everyone claps?

80.dialogue: I dunno, what do you think?

90a_20.speaker: speaker_akali
90a_20.dialogue: When did you get so serious? You never want to joke around anymore.

90a_30.speaker: speaker_kaisa
90a_30.dialogue: I can joke. Just not about abusing our powers. The guardians would never do that.

90b_20.speaker: speaker_akali
90b_20.dialogue: When did you get so serious? You never want to joke around anymore.

90b_30.speaker: speaker_kaisa
90b_30.dialogue: I can joke. Just not about abusing our powers. The guardians would never do that.

90c_20.speaker: speaker_kaisa
90c_20.dialogue: No, I’m sure they would. And a little parade would march in front of the school, and you’d get to meet the mayor.

90c_30.speaker: speaker_kaisa
90c_30.dialogue: But seriously, don’t joke about using your powers like that. We’re supposed to be the good guys.

100.speaker: speaker_akali
100.dialogue: …Fine. I wasn’t really going to.

110.speaker: speaker_kaisa
110.dialogue: By the way, are you training with us this weekend? You haven’t been around the past few weeks… I’ve been worried.

120.speaker: speaker_akali
120.dialogue: Oh, yeah… Maybe next time. I’m trying to catch up on some stuff…

130.speaker: speaker_kaisa
130.dialogue: Akali, come on. What if monsters attack? What if the city is in danger?

140.speaker: speaker_akali
140.dialogue: …Yeah, I know, but…

150.speaker: speaker_kaisa
150.dialogue: Everyone remembers Lux and Ahri and their squads. There are statues of them. We have a responsibility to protect people.

160.speaker: speaker_kaisa
160.dialogue: Are you just going to skip your training and let everyone down?

170.speaker: speaker_akali
170.dialogue: Let everyone down…?

180.speaker: speaker_akali
180.dialogue: Let everyone down?! What are you talking about?!

190.speaker: speaker_akali
190.dialogue: I train with you all the time. All you care about anymore is being a Star Guardian! I thought you said nothing was going to change between us!

200.speaker: speaker_kaisa
200.dialogue: W-what?! Hey, we’re both leaders here!

210.speaker: speaker_akali
210.dialogue: Leaders?! Who cares! When was the last time we hung out outside of stupid training!?

220.speaker: speaker_kaisa
220.dialogue: We’re hanging out now!

230.speaker: speaker_akali
230.dialogue: We’re walking home from school, and you’re still making it about being a guardian! You won’t even let me crack a joke!

240.speaker: speaker_kaisa
240.dialogue: I… grrr!

250.speaker: speaker_kaisa
250.dialogue: You know what? You’re right. You are right.

260.speaker: speaker_akali
260.dialogue: I… am?

270.speaker: speaker_kaisa
270.dialogue: I’m sorry… I just…

280.speaker: speaker_kaisa
280.dialogue: Kali… Have you been seeing things recently? Visions of the invasion?

300.speaker: speaker_kaisa
300.dialogue: I haven’t been sleeping well since school started. If I focus on the team, it’s… easier to deal with.

320.speaker: speaker_akali
320.dialogue: Kai, I’ve been seeing things too. Hearing things.

330.speaker: speaker_akali
330.dialogue: I keep thinking about that night last year… all those people…

340.speaker: speaker_akali
340.dialogue: This entire neighborhood was pummeled by falling stars. How many people died here? The city rebuilt so fast… I…

350.speaker: speaker_akali
350.dialogue: I can’t get them out of my head. It’s like I’m being haunted by their ghosts.

360.speaker: speaker_akali
360.dialogue: I keep wondering if this is what being a guardian will always feel like. I really hope it isn’t.

370.speaker: speaker_akali

response.dialogue: Following you? What does that mean?
Is it a monster? You’re pretty strong… Can’t you fight it?
…Have you ever met a guy named Tedric?

370.dialogue: And now I think… I think something’s been following me.

380a_10.speaker: speaker_akali
380a_10.dialogue: At first, it was just bad dreams.

380a_20.speaker: speaker_akali
380a_20.dialogue: I kept seeing the mall collapse… that guardian vanishing into the light… Zoe, destroying everything…

380a_30.speaker: speaker_akali
380a_30.dialogue: But then… then there was a voice…

380b_10.speaker: speaker_akali
380b_10.dialogue: I don’t even know what it is.

380b_20.speaker: speaker_akali
380b_20.dialogue: I thought I would stop having dreams of the invasion… but they never went away.

380b_30.speaker: speaker_akali
380b_30.dialogue: And now… I think the memories drew something to me. Something really, really bad.

380c_20.speaker: speaker_kaisa
380c_20.dialogue: Yeah, that guy who worked at the bakery. He’s been missing for a couple of weeks.

380c_30.speaker: speaker_akali
380c_30.dialogue: Really? That can’t be connected… right?

410.speaker: speaker_unknown
410.dialogue: …YOu’ll… neVer…

420.speaker: speaker_kaisa
420.dialogue: Akali, what?

430.speaker: speaker_akali
430.dialogue: We… We need to go…

450.speaker: speaker_kaisa
450.dialogue: Sure, let’s… Hey… What’s happening to the streets?!

460.speaker: speaker_akali
460.dialogue: It’s here.

470.speaker: speaker_fiddlesticks
470.dialogue: …SaaAAAvE MeeEEEeee!

480.speaker: speaker_kaisa
480.dialogue: What… What the hell is that…? Where are we?

490.speaker: speaker_akali
490.dialogue: I… I don’t know..! Is that what’s been following me?!

500.speaker: speaker_akali
500.dialogue: This fear...! Kai, I can’t transform…! I can’t focus!

510.speaker: speaker_fiddlesticks
510.dialogue: Akali…

520.speaker: speaker_fiddlesticks
520.dialogue: AKALI!!!!

530.speaker: speaker_kaisa
530.dialogue: …Don’t worry. I’ve got you, Kali.

540.speaker: speaker_kaisa
540.dialogue: I’ll protect you. I’ll protect you from everything.

550.speaker: speaker_kaisa
550.dialogue: That’s what Star Guardians do.

560.speaker: speaker_kaisa
560.dialogue: Hear that?! You’re not going near her! I won’t let you!

570.speaker: speaker_fiddlesticks
570.dialogue: Erh… urp... all… Star... Guardians… must…

580.speaker: speaker_fiddlesticks
580.dialogue: …falllllll…

590.speaker: speaker_kaisa
590.dialogue: Huh? Is that it? Where’s it going?

600.speaker: speaker_kaisa
600.dialogue: You running away? Afraid of the new guardians, huh?!

610.speaker: speaker_unknown
610.dialogue: Oh, I don’t think that’s the case at all, my sweet. You’re very lucky.

620.speaker: speaker_unknown
620.dialogue: Ah, much better. Your kind tends to prefer the shackles of an… ordered world, I believe? Can’t have all this bright purple mucking everything up.

630.speaker: speaker_unknown
630.dialogue: Regardless. My friend is far more powerful than you realize. You and that blubbering sick pile wouldn’t have stood a chance.

640.speaker: speaker_kaisa
640.dialogue: Don’t listen to her, okay?

660.speaker: speaker_unknown
660.dialogue: You were able to transform despite the aura of fear? Very impressive.

670.speaker: speaker_unknown
670.dialogue: I’ll have to keep an eye on you, won’t I? Hmhmhm.

680.speaker: speaker_kaisa
680.dialogue: Tell me who you are before I blow you to pieces.

690.speaker: speaker_unknown
690.dialogue: You? Oh, please. I was half expecting that monster to eat you both alive.

700.speaker: speaker_unknown
700.dialogue: It’s an odd one, though. Seems to act almost randomly… and it certainly doesn't listen to anything I have to say.

710.speaker: speaker_unknown
710.dialogue: But that makes the game more entertaining, doesn’t it? You guardians are slaves to a kind and just universe. Fiddlesticks is… free.

730.speaker: speaker_unknown
730.dialogue: You’re making some very bold demands, my darling. But you can call me… Morgana.

740.speaker: speaker_morgana
740.dialogue: Your instructor is a man named Puboe, correct? What say I pay him a visit? Relieve him of that pesky teaching position? I could use the pocket money, hmhmhm.

750.speaker: speaker_kaisa
750.dialogue: Leave him alone! I won’t let you hurt him!

760.speaker: speaker_morgana
760.dialogue: Ah, my darling girl. You think you can stop me?

770.speaker: speaker_morgana
770.dialogue: Hmhmhm. You were right about needing that training. Would have helped you a year ago with Zoe’s little invasion.

780.speaker: speaker_kaisa
780.dialogue: How do you know about that?! If you were involved somehow...!

790.speaker: speaker_morgana
790.dialogue: Chin up, dearie. Your co-leader seems quite traumatized by this experience… You should focus on the present.

800.speaker: speaker_morgana

response.dialogue: You’re lying.
You better not touch my friends.
That’s a smart outfit, but it won’t stop me from destroying you.

800.dialogue: Especially when my terrifying friend is visiting each of your teammates right now!

810.speaker: speaker_morgana
810.dialogue: Oh, hush. Your friends are… well, mostly fine. Though they may be reevaluating their membership in the Star Guardians, hmhmhm.

820.speaker: speaker_morgana
820.dialogue: And with that, toodaloo, little girl. I have places to go, and plans to further. We’ll meet again soon.

830.speaker: speaker_morgana
830.dialogue: I’m sure your team will handle this wrinkle just fine! Hmhmhmhahahahaha!

860.speaker: speaker_akali
860.dialogue: …I’m sorry, Kai… I think I need to go home…

880.speaker: speaker_kaisa
880.dialogue: Yeah, me too. I hope everyone’s okay.

10.speaker: speaker_morgana
10.dialogue: My, my. What a quaint little street.

20.speaker: speaker_morgana
20.dialogue: They must have worked quickly to repair the damage after that brat botched her invasion last year. Hmph, what a waste.

30.speaker: speaker_morgana
30.dialogue: And what did they replace all those buildings with, hm? Rows and rows of shops?

40.speaker: speaker_morgana
40.dialogue: Hmhmhm! As ever, these humans bend themselves toward such casual cruelties. Wealth extraction! It seems so antithetical to the entire Star Guardian ideal.

50.speaker: speaker_morgana
50.dialogue: But what do I know? I'm a soon-to-be lowly homeroom teacher at a… public school. [Shiver!]

60.speaker: speaker_morgana
60.dialogue: Well, enough idling. I suppose it’s time to make a mess of things.

70.speaker: speaker_morgana
70.dialogue: Gentlemen… the floor is yours.

80.speaker: speaker_man
80.dialogue: Hey… what’s that…?

90.speaker: speaker_woman
90.dialogue: N... no way! It’s a bunch of monsters!

100.speaker: speaker_man
100.dialogue: Stay back! S… stop! Someone help!

110.speaker: speaker_morgana
110.dialogue: Here’s your first test, guardians. Let’s hope you pass.

120.speaker: speaker_ekko
120.dialogue: Akali! Keep your head in the game! This is what guardians do!

130.speaker: speaker_akali
130.dialogue: Those are actual monsters! I don’t… I can’t focus… because of that stupid Fiddlesticks thing, ugh!

140.speaker: speaker_man
140.dialogue: P-please! Don’t hurt me! Waaaaagh!

150.speaker: speaker_woman
150.dialogue: Where are the Star Guardians?! Where is Lux?! Help us!

160.speaker: speaker_ekko
160.dialogue: Ugh. Lux isn’t here anymore. Wish she was, but…

170.speaker: speaker_ekko
170.dialogue: Shoot. There are way too many of those things. People are going to get hurt.

180.speaker: speaker_ekko
180.dialogue: You ready to put it all on the line, ‘Kali? We might not come back alive.

190.speaker: speaker_akali
190.dialogue: A…alive?! What do you mean? You think we might die out there?!

200.speaker: speaker_ekko
200.dialogue: Hey, maybe! But we’re Star Guardians!

210.speaker: speaker_ekko
210.dialogue: Or at least we’re supposed to be.

220.speaker: speaker_akali
220.dialogue: Why is everyone obsessed about what a Star Guardian is supposed to be? Are Star Guardians supposed to be killed by monsters?!

230.speaker: speaker_akali
230.dialogue: I just didn’t think… Ugh, this reminds me of last year… I don’t…

240.speaker: speaker_kaisa
240.dialogue: Akali! Ekko!

250.speaker: speaker_akali
250.dialogue: Kai! You’re here!

260.speaker: speaker_akali

response.dialogue: What’s the situation?
I’m taking point. Everyone, follow my lead.
Loving the checkerboard nightmare aesthetic. We should come here more often.

260.dialogue: I’m so gl—

270a_10.speaker: speaker_ekko
270a_10.dialogue: Monsters, tons of them. They’re kinda puny by themselves, but there are at least a few dozen out there.

270a_20.speaker: speaker_akali
270a_20.dialogue: We don’t know where they came from. And everything’s all… messed up… like when that creepy monster attacked us.

270a_30.speaker: speaker_kaisa
270a_30.dialogue: I was wondering about that. The pattern looks familiar… What was that creature’s name? Fiddlesticks?

270a_40.speaker: speaker_ekko
270a_40.dialogue: Ugh, I don’t wanna think about that thing. It showed up in my dreams… I’ll never forget that voice…

270b_10.speaker: speaker_ekko
270b_10.dialogue: Copy that, Cap’n Kai. What’s the big plan?

270b_20.speaker: speaker_kaisa
270b_20.dialogue: Hm. Looks like a few dozen of them, and they’re coming out of that checkerboard goop.

270b_30.speaker: speaker_kaisa
270b_30.dialogue: Sweep the street. We hit fast and hard, and close that breach.

270b_40.speaker: speaker_ekko
270b_40.dialogue: Got it. What do we do if that Fiddlesticks thing shows up?

270b_50.speaker: speaker_akali
270b_50.dialogue: Ugh… Do you think it will?

270c_40.speaker: speaker_ekko
270c_40.dialogue: Yeah, yeah, very funny. That pattern on the street looks a lot like Fiddlesticks, so if we run into it, maybe it’ll share your sense of humor.

280.speaker: speaker_kaisa
280.dialogue: I’m not feeling that overwhelming sense of dread… It must not be here.

300.speaker: speaker_kaisa
300.dialogue: I sense that woman, though… She was here. Morgana.

310.speaker: speaker_kaisa
310.dialogue: Kali? Are you good? We need you for this, okay?

320.speaker: speaker_akali
320.dialogue: …I-I don’t… I don’t want…

330.speaker: speaker_akali
330.dialogue: Hm! Yeah, I’ll be fine. The mission comes first.

340.speaker: speaker_kaisa
340.dialogue: Glad you’re with us, then. And don’t worry… I’ll keep you safe.

350.speaker: speaker_akali
350.dialogue: Pfft… Yeah… I know you will. You’re a Star Guardian. It’s what you do!

360.speaker: speaker_ekko
360.dialogue: Oh, my God. Fight now! Talk later!

370.speaker: speaker_akali
370.dialogue: Whatever, boy genius. Let’s see what you’ve got out there.

380.speaker: speaker_kaisa
380.dialogue: I have Sona and Taliyah covering both ends of the street, so nothing is getting in or out.

390.speaker: speaker_kaisa
390.dialogue: Check your angles, and prioritize saving anyone in danger. We’re going in!

400.speaker: speaker_akali
400.dialogue: It’s the big show, everyone! Get ready to make a statement!

410.speaker: speaker_ekko
410.dialogue: Excuse me, but I’m Ekko.

420.speaker: speaker_ekko
420.dialogue: I always make a statement.

430.speaker: speaker_kaisa
430.dialogue: We’re not just guardians in training anymore! Let’s show this city we’re real heroes!

440.speaker: speaker_ekko
440.dialogue: Welcome to VC! Now, get out!

450.speaker: speaker_akali
450.dialogue: Cut through everything! Don’t let these chumps touch you!

460.speaker: speaker_akali
460.dialogue: Ha… ha… Okay, maybe that wasn’t as bad as I...

470.speaker: speaker_akali
470.dialogue: …Wait, did we do it?

480.speaker: speaker_ekko
480.dialogue: I think so? I don’t see any more monsters.

490.speaker: speaker_kaisa

response.dialogue: I think we might have won?
We saved the city! WE SAVED THE CITY!
Pentakill! Ace! Legendary!

490.dialogue: And all that stuff that was warping the street is gone. I hesitate to say it, but…

510.speaker: speaker_chiizu
510.dialogue: OUR FIRST REAL VICTORY! …Is what Miss Sona said. Right, Miss Sona?

520.speaker: speaker_taliyah
520.dialogue: That was crazy! I was over there, like, fwoom! And then Sona was, like, bwong! And you guys were, like, boooom! It was awesome!

530.speaker: speaker_taliyah
530.dialogue: Semi-related, but there is a huge magical wall blocking the end of the street that I may have put there and cannot remove. We should go.

540.speaker: speaker_akali
540.dialogue: You’re never this amped at school, Tali.

550.speaker: speaker_taliyah
550.dialogue: Because I don’t have star powers or a cool outfit there, duh. Also, I smashed this monster with a huge rock, and it was like, “Bleeeurgh”.

560.speaker: speaker_kaisa
560.dialogue: …Thanks, everyone. Let’s get out of here before people start to notice what we look like.

570.speaker: speaker_ekko
570.dialogue: Aw, come on. I wanna be a bootleg action figure like Rakan or that blonde dude… Ezmorp? You know, the blue one.

590.speaker: speaker_chiizu
590.dialogue: Speech, speech!

600.speaker: speaker_kaisa
600.dialogue: We can save it for a victory meal tomorrow, alright?

610.speaker: speaker_akali
610.dialogue: Boooooo! We want a speech, or to be bootleg Star Guardian action figures with weird names!

620.speaker: speaker_kaisa
620.dialogue: If we leave now, I’ll do the speech tomorrow at Noodle Bill’s.

630.speaker: speaker_akali
630.dialogue: Noodle Bill’s?! Everyone go home! We’re done here!

640.speaker: speaker_ekko
640.dialogue: Wow, she moves fast.

660.speaker: speaker_kaisa
660.dialogue: One thing I need to ask, though… Did it feel like this was a test? Those things went down… almost too easily.

670.speaker: speaker_ekko
670.dialogue: Hey, why overthink it?

690.speaker: speaker_chiizu
690.dialogue: Let’s just bask in our very first victory!

710.speaker: speaker_chiizu
710.dialogue: WHAT DID I SAY WRONG?! WAS IT BASK?! I HAVE A VERY LARGE VOCABULARY!

720.speaker: speaker_taliyah
720.dialogue: Heh. But, yeah… makes you wonder…

730.speaker: speaker_taliyah
730.dialogue: Who else might be watching us?

10.speaker: speaker_kaisa
10.dialogue: Tell me, what would you do?

20.speaker: speaker_kaisa
20.dialogue: You saved the world, right? I saw you do it. Come on, tell me something!

30.speaker: speaker_kaisa
30.dialogue: Lux… Please… What should I do?

40.speaker: speaker_kaisa
40.dialogue: Ugh… I’m talking to a statue. And to myself.

50.speaker: speaker_kaisa
50.dialogue: [Sigh]

60.speaker: speaker_kaisa
60.dialogue: It felt like we were finally safe, like you made everything… safe. That’s why I wanted to be like you. But…

70.speaker: speaker_morgana
70.dialogue: Hello, class. I come bearing some truly tragic news.

80.speaker: speaker_morgana
80.dialogue: Your former instructor… Mr. Puboe? He’s met with a very unfortunate accident during the shocking incident downtown. I’m afraid he won’t be returning.

90.speaker: speaker_morgana
90.dialogue: Thankfully, I was willing to step in to help shape your young minds. Though I’m new to the profession, I’m sure we’ll all learn to see eye to eye.

100.speaker: speaker_morgana
100.dialogue: Some of us… more than others, I suspect. Hmhmhm.

110.speaker: speaker_morgana
110.dialogue: Despite the circumstances… I think we’re going to have a wonderful year together.

120.speaker: speaker_kaisa
120.dialogue: We can’t transform at school. We can’t reveal our identities…

130.speaker: speaker_kaisa
130.dialogue: We can’t do anything! How do you fight a monster that’s hiding in plain sight?! I just want to protect everyone!

140.speaker: speaker_kaisa
140.dialogue: This city looks up to you. They remember the old guardians. I want to… No, I have to be a Star Guardian the way you were. A leader.

150.speaker: speaker_kaisa
150.dialogue: Lux… Tell me… What do I do?

160.speaker: speaker_akali
160.dialogue: Talking to the statue again, huh?

170.speaker: speaker_kaisa

response.dialogue: Yeah, you caught me.
Uh… no?
Excuse me, I’m with my therapist.

170.dialogue: Akali! I, uh...

180a_10.speaker: speaker_akali
180a_10.dialogue: You know… I’m around if you want to talk.

180a_20.speaker: speaker_kaisa
180a_20.dialogue: I… I don’t want you to hear this stuff. These thoughts stay with me.

180a_30.speaker: speaker_akali
180a_30.dialogue: We weren’t always Star Guardians, Kai… We were friends first.

180b_10.speaker: speaker_akali
180b_10.dialogue: It’s alright, Kai. I’m not going to make fun of you or anything.

180b_20.speaker: speaker_akali
180b_20.dialogue: You know, you don't have to talk to a statue. I’m always here if you need me.

180b_30.speaker: speaker_kaisa
180b_30.dialogue: …Thanks, Kali. You know I don’t like asking for help. If I focus on leading the group…

180b_40.speaker: speaker_akali
180b_40.dialogue: Well, don’t forget I’m here, okay? I’m not a statue, but you know.

180c_10.speaker: speaker_akali
180c_10.dialogue: Oho, look at you! So fancy with your big-city therapist!

180c_20.speaker: speaker_kaisa
180c_20.dialogue: You also live in the city!

180c_30.speaker: speaker_akali
180c_30.dialogue: True, but if I needed to talk about my problems on a budget, maybe I’d go to… I dunno… my best friend?

180c_40.speaker: speaker_kaisa
180c_40.dialogue: Akali, we’ve talked about this. Leading the guardians is…

190.speaker: speaker_kaisa
190.dialogue: Hm? That’s weird… My phone’s going off.

200.speaker: speaker_akali
200.dialogue: Why’s that weird? Ekko is always texting about machine stuff. Or maybe Taliyah “found another rock”.

210.speaker: speaker_akali
210.dialogue: Or… oof, I hope it’s not a giant wall of text from Sona. I love her, but… please… my one brain cell…

220.speaker: speaker_kaisa
220.dialogue: [“Nice work handling those creatures. Now that we know you can handle yourselves, we should discuss a… mutual problem. Meet us outside the city, alone.”]

230.speaker: speaker_kaisa
230.dialogue: [“And don’t keep us waiting! You know how I get when I’m BORED!”]

240.speaker: speaker_kaisa
240.dialogue: [Hm… Must be that monster again… Fiddlesticks. I won’t let it hurt Akali, or the team.]

250.speaker: speaker_akali
250.dialogue: Kai? You’re getting quiet again.

260.speaker: speaker_akali
260.dialogue: It’s a Sona text, isn’t it? How long? Two paragraphs?

280.speaker: speaker_kaisa
280.dialogue: I’m so sorry, but I have to go. This is…

300.speaker: speaker_akali
300.dialogue: Wait, what’s wrong?! Kai?! Kai!

310.speaker: speaker_akali
310.dialogue: Hmph. Think you can avoid me? Best-friend-following ninja-jutsu, activate!

330.speaker: speaker_akali
330.dialogue: Don’t judge me, Lux statue. I’m leaning into it.

340.speaker: speaker_kaisa
340.dialogue: Huff… huff…

350.speaker: speaker_kaisa
350.dialogue: …Guh… Alright… huff… This is the spot.

360.speaker: speaker_kaisa
360.dialogue: …At least, I think it is. Exact coordinates would have been nice.

370.speaker: speaker_kaisa
370.dialogue: …Huff… ugh… Flying is… so much easier…

380.speaker: speaker_unknown
380.dialogue: I concur. It’s one of our more useful powers.

400.speaker: speaker_kaisa
400.dialogue: Show yourself, monster! I’m not in the mood for games!

410.speaker: speaker_unknown
410.dialogue: Tee-hee! She thinks WE’RE the monster! That’s a fun game. I wanna play THAT one!

420.speaker: speaker_unknown
420.dialogue: This isn’t another chance for you to destroy the city. You know what we’re here for.

430.speaker: speaker_unknown
430.dialogue: Oh, BOO! I just want to have FUN!

450.speaker: speaker_unknown
450.dialogue: Oh, it’s VERY possible!

460.speaker: speaker_syndra
460.dialogue: Don’t act so surprised. This is not the first time we’ve met.

470.speaker: speaker_zoe
470.dialogue: Oh, boy! A widdle baby STAR GUARDIAN! Can I peel off her skin? CAN I?!

480.speaker: speaker_zoe
480.dialogue: OooooOOOooooo, wait! She recognizes me! Was it something I did? Was it someone I KILLED?!

490.speaker: speaker_syndra
490.dialogue: Silence. You’ve spoken enough, Twilight Star. Empty threats accomplish nothing… and we don’t have much time.

500.speaker: speaker_kaisa
500.dialogue: Wh… what are you two doing together?! Syndra, you’re a Star Guardian! And that’s...!

510.speaker: speaker_syndra
510.dialogue: …Also a Star Guardian.

520.speaker: speaker_syndra
520.dialogue: Or at least, she was one. Though that was many lifetimes ago.

530.speaker: speaker_zoe
530.dialogue: Now, I have lots of fun DISINTEGRATING my friends! That’s YOU, widdle guardian!

540.speaker: speaker_kaisa
540.dialogue: No… I saw Rakan destroy you! The guardians beat you!

550.speaker: speaker_kaisa
550.dialogue: The entire city watched you die!

560.speaker: speaker_zoe
560.dialogue: Awww, are your expectations crushed? Do you need a hug and some sparkles to get over it? Well, TOO BAD!

570.speaker: speaker_zoe
570.dialogue: You can’t kill chaos, silly! But that Rakan boy really did put the hurt on me, YEOWCH!

580.speaker: speaker_zoe
580.dialogue: It took me AGES to find this world again! And by then, all the guardians I wanted to kill were loooong gone!

590.speaker: speaker_zoe
590.dialogue: …Except for this one. Yuck.

600.speaker: speaker_syndra

response.dialogue: Wait, so why are you both here?
Syndra, how could you betray the Star Guardians like this?
Zoe, I’ll never forgive you for what you’ve done!

600.dialogue: The feeling is mutual.

610a_10.speaker: speaker_syndra
610a_10.dialogue: As I mentioned, we have a mutual problem.

610a_30.speaker: speaker_syndra
610a_30.dialogue: Morgana? Interesting… So, she’s already here…

610a_40.speaker: speaker_zoe
610a_40.dialogue: Ooooh, one of your stupid new playmates, Syndra?

610a_50.speaker: speaker_syndra
610a_50.dialogue: In a certain light. Though I’ve never been very fond of her. Deal with Morgana as you will, young guardian. She is not why we’ve contacted you.

610b_10.speaker: speaker_zoe
610b_10.dialogue: Ohohoho! Syndra, how COULD you!? The guardians! The First Star! Friendship and love and cookies!

610b_30.speaker: speaker_syndra
610b_30.dialogue: You are pursuing an ideal you don’t fully understand, girl. Do you think Lux was the first to take the oath? Or Ahri? Or Xayah?

610b_40.speaker: speaker_syndra
610b_40.dialogue: The First Star’s power comes at a terrible cost. In the end, it takes the only thing that matters… and that is why we’re here.

610b_50.speaker: speaker_zoe
610b_50.dialogue: Looks like we’re gonna be PALS, widdle baby guardian!

610c_10.speaker: speaker_syndra
610c_10.dialogue: That’s right… You witnessed the invasion.

610c_20.speaker: speaker_kaisa
610c_20.dialogue: The Battle of the Twilight Star… So many people… my friends…

610c_30.speaker: speaker_zoe
610c_30.dialogue: Uh-oh! Do we have some UNEXAMINED TRAUMA on our hands?! Oooh, I LOVE trauma!

610c_40.speaker: speaker_zoe
610c_40.dialogue: Did they SCREAM when they died… or were they lucky enough to get BOPPED on the head by a falling star?!

610c_50.speaker: speaker_zoe
610c_50.dialogue: …YOU won’t forgive ME?! You don’t know ANYTHING! You humans live for a hundred years, and then, you’re GONE! You can’t imagine...! You can’t!

620.speaker: speaker_syndra
620.dialogue: We’ve come for Fiddlesticks.

630.speaker: speaker_kaisa
630.dialogue: …The checkerboard monster with the awful voice? That’s who you want?

640.speaker: speaker_zoe
640.dialogue: It was CHESS! SHE LOVED CHESS!

660.speaker: speaker_zoe
660.dialogue: She… she loved…

680.speaker: speaker_syndra
680.dialogue: Fiddlesticks is more powerful than any foe I have ever faced. It has existed since the days of the very first Star Guardians… and has hunted us all from the shadows.

690.speaker: speaker_kaisa
690.dialogue: Since the first...?

700.speaker: speaker_syndra
700.dialogue: Zoe, myself, and our companions. The original Star Guardians chosen by the First Star. Back before the costs of our oaths were made clear.

710.speaker: speaker_zoe
710.dialogue: We’re gonna SMASH that monster for what it did! I’M GONNA RIP OFF ITS STUPID HEAD!

720.speaker: speaker_syndra
720.dialogue: It has grown far too powerful with victims and time. While we are strong, we cannot stop it alone.

730.speaker: speaker_syndra
730.dialogue: Prepare yourself and your team. If we strike together, maybe we stand a chance.

770.speaker: speaker_kaisa
770.dialogue: But what happens after this? What about… her?

790.speaker: speaker_syndra
790.dialogue: We’ll cross that bridge if we survive. Until then…

800.speaker: speaker_syndra
800.dialogue: …Take care, guardian. The battle ahead may be our last.

10.speaker: speaker_kaisa
10.dialogue: Kali! Hey! Stop walking so fast!

20.speaker: speaker_kaisa
20.dialogue: I can explain! Would you just listen to me for a minute?!

30.speaker: speaker_kaisa
30.dialogue: Akali!!!

40.speaker: speaker_kaisa
40.dialogue: Please! I didn’t have a choice!

50.speaker: speaker_akali
50.dialogue: You didn’t have a choice?

60.speaker: speaker_akali
60.dialogue: It’s bad enough to have Morgana standing in front of the class every day, but you…

70.speaker: speaker_akali
70.dialogue: You want me to work with Zoe? Do you not remember what she did?!

80.speaker: speaker_kaisa
80.dialogue: Of course, I remember! I was there during the invasion! I saw what happened!

90.speaker: speaker_akali
90.dialogue: I don’t know what you saw. Obviously something different from what I saw.

100.speaker: speaker_akali
100.dialogue: I watched a paddle star destroy my old neighborhood. A building collapsed next to me with people still inside. I saw a Star Guardian actually die.

110.speaker: speaker_akali
110.dialogue: You saw… what? Lux saving the day? Being a big hero, getting a statue? They left us, Kai’Sa.

120.speaker: speaker_akali
120.dialogue: The old guardians are all gone. All of them! They left us here to do this ourselves, and now, I…

130.speaker: speaker_akali
130.dialogue: I am being hunted and tortured by that… that thing. I can’t even go home at night by myself. I hear it everywhere. It’s following me!

140.speaker: speaker_kaisa
140.dialogue: Akali, I can fix this. The guardians aren’t gone! Syndra said—

150.speaker: speaker_akali
150.dialogue: Stop. Don’t even say her name. As a matter of fact, don’t even say my name. Don’t talk to me, period.

160.speaker: speaker_akali
160.dialogue: Your obsession with being a Star Guardian is… I can’t deal with it anymore. Do you even care how I feel? Do you know what I see when I close my eyes?!

170.speaker: speaker_akali
170.dialogue: So many people I cared about are dead. And now there’s nothing stopping me from dying, too. And you don’t even care.

180.speaker: speaker_akali
180.dialogue: I took this stupid oath because I believed in you! You promised nothing would change!

200.speaker: speaker_akali
200.dialogue: I need you to tell me we’re going to win this... that everything will be fine.

210.speaker: speaker_akali

response.dialogue: Everything will be fine. [LIE]
Everything will be fine. [TRUTH]
I don’t have an answer for you.

210.dialogue: And I need you to mean it.

220a_20.speaker: speaker_akali
220a_20.dialogue: I’ll be there the next time there’s a monster attack. But you and I? Nah.

220a_30.speaker: speaker_akali
220a_30.dialogue: I don’t want to hear from you unless it’s a life-or-death situation. “Best friends.” Pfft.

220b_20.speaker: speaker_akali
220b_20.dialogue: You know, I tried to follow you. When you went to talk to that creepy-eyed little murderer.

220b_30.speaker: speaker_akali
220b_30.dialogue: Guess what happened? I was attacked by Fiddlesticks. Again! And you didn’t even notice.

220b_40.speaker: speaker_akali
220b_40.dialogue: It’s happening almost every day. I can hear it in my room at night. But, oh, you have to be a leader. You have to “be a Star Guardian.”

220c_20.speaker: speaker_akali
220c_20.dialogue: Let me make things clear for you right now, since you’re the big leader of the Star Guardians.

220c_30.speaker: speaker_akali
220c_30.dialogue: A woman from nowhere is teaching homeroom in our grade, and sometimes, she decides to summon hundreds of monsters to attack people in the streets.

220c_40.speaker: speaker_akali
220c_40.dialogue: I am being hunted… like an animal… by… I don’t even know how to describe it. But I’m pretty sure it’s going to kill me.

220c_50.speaker: speaker_akali
220c_50.dialogue: And now, you're gonna make us team up with Zoe—the source of all our nightmares, the reason this all happened!

230.speaker: speaker_kaisa
230.dialogue: …I’m just trying to protect everyone.

240.speaker: speaker_akali
240.dialogue: Oh, really? Did you tell Sona about Zoe? She sure does love loud noises and crowds after being traumatized by explosions!

250.speaker: speaker_akali
250.dialogue: What about Taliyah, who’s so confident at school? Or maybe Ekko? Our friend obsessed with literally changing the past?

260.speaker: speaker_kaisa
260.dialogue: They… Yeah, they weren’t happy.

270.speaker: speaker_akali
270.dialogue: Wow. Shocker. Kai’Sa the leader didn’t check in beforehand.

280.speaker: speaker_akali
280.dialogue: We’re done here. I’m sure Fiddlesticks will be a delightful walking companion, whenever and wherever it decides to tell me that I’m going to die.

300.speaker: speaker_kaisa
300.dialogue: Ugh.

310.speaker: speaker_kaisa
310.dialogue: I just… I want to protect you all like Lux did…

320.speaker: speaker_kaisa
320.dialogue: Why can’t I protect you...?

330.speaker: speaker_noodle_bill
330.dialogue: Well, well! If it isn’t Miss Kai’Sa herself! Welcome back to Noodle Bill’s!

340.speaker: speaker_noodle_bill
340.dialogue: Can I treat you to the usual, or...?

360.speaker: speaker_noodle_bill
360.dialogue: Let me whip something up for you. On the house.

370.speaker: speaker_noodle_bill
370.dialogue: Until then, take a load off! Relax a little. You can eat with your friend.

380.speaker: speaker_kaisa
380.dialogue: …My friend?

400.speaker: speaker_kaisa
400.dialogue: Syndra?! But… you’re… you!? And in your uniform?! What about… but… your identity?!

410.speaker: speaker_syndra
410.dialogue: Heh. I suppose it’s a bit surprising to see me here.

420.speaker: speaker_syndra
420.dialogue: But, as the saying goes… “everyone loves Noodle Bill’s.”

430.speaker: speaker_syndra
430.dialogue: Don’t worry about him, by the way. The man can keep a secret.

440.speaker: speaker_noodle_bill
440.dialogue: Your friends show up here in uniform all the time. Benefit of being open late—lots of Star Guardian regulars, and they show up very hungry.

450.speaker: speaker_kaisa
450.dialogue: [Ugh… Akali...! Or Ekko? Maybe Taliyah…]

460.speaker: speaker_noodle_bill
460.dialogue: It’s all of them. And you, twice.

470.speaker: speaker_kaisa
470.dialogue: M…me?! TWICE?! I don’t even—!

480.speaker: speaker_noodle_bill
480.dialogue: Don’t be too hard on yourself. Syndra’s friends were even worse.

490.speaker: speaker_noodle_bill
490.dialogue: In fact, I seem to remember…

500.speaker: speaker_syndra
500.dialogue: Bill, please, not another one of your stories.

510.speaker: speaker_noodle_bill
510.dialogue: What was the bird girl’s name... Xayah! Boy, she used to show up at the strangest hours, and always with that Rakan…

520.speaker: speaker_syndra
520.dialogue: Ugh. Those two. By the time I met them, they were… different… but still, so much PDA…

530.speaker: speaker_kaisa
530.dialogue: So… So you...?

540.speaker: speaker_noodle_bill
540.dialogue: I’ve been serving Star Guardians a long, long time. Don’t worry. Your identity is safe with me.

550.speaker: speaker_syndra
550.dialogue: And for that, we thank you.

560.speaker: speaker_kaisa
560.dialogue: Huh… I guess I assumed the old Star Guardians were always saving the day from evil… I didn’t really consider they had another side to them.

570.speaker: speaker_syndra
570.dialogue: Ha!

580.speaker: speaker_syndra
580.dialogue: More like saving the day from Jinx’s little temper tantrums. Or Sarah refusing to talk to anyone or show up for anything.

590.speaker: speaker_syndra
590.dialogue: We weren’t that different, Kai’Sa. Most of the group was still in high school… like you and your friends.

600.speaker: speaker_syndra
600.dialogue: We had fights, there were falling-outs, people made up. Usually crying. Sometimes ugly crying, with snot.

610.speaker: speaker_syndra
610.dialogue: Everyone was constantly embroiled in drama, and there was always some new, horrible monster to fight.

620.speaker: speaker_syndra
620.dialogue: It was… nice. Reminded me of… well, my first team. Zoe’s team.

630.speaker: speaker_kaisa
630.dialogue: Oh, yeah… You mentioned that before. Huh, you and Zoe.

640.speaker: speaker_kaisa

response.dialogue: What happened to your old team?
Why did Zoe attack the city?
Did you two have a falling-out?

640.dialogue: Now that you’ve brought it up, I have to ask…

650a_20.speaker: speaker_syndra
650a_20.dialogue: Gwen, Akshan, Zoe, myself… and Harp. Most are gone now. Fallen. The ultimate fate of all guardians.

650a_40.speaker: speaker_syndra
650a_40.dialogue: Sadly, yes. They were kind, gentle souls… Even Zoe, if you can imagine it. Even Akshan, who hated putting on his shirt for some reason.

650b_10.speaker: speaker_syndra
650b_10.dialogue: Hm. It might be difficult to understand, but… she found a loophole in the oath.

650b_20.speaker: speaker_syndra
650b_20.dialogue: “Star Guardians burn bright, but all are fated to fall.” We’re killed in battle, or lost… or worse. It’s the price of doing good.

650b_30.speaker: speaker_kaisa
650b_30.dialogue: Wait, so she thought she was… helping people?

650b_40.speaker: speaker_syndra
650b_40.dialogue: By killing and resurrecting guardians, Zoe voided the contract with the First Star. She… believed she was saving them. Though… There were unintended consequences.

650c_20.speaker: speaker_syndra
650c_20.dialogue: Something… happened… to one of our companions. Something we didn’t know was possible. Though, in hindsight, it should have been obvious.

650c_30.speaker: speaker_syndra
650c_30.dialogue: They fell. Zoe couldn’t handle it. She vanished… only to return, twisted and deranged. And then… she… our team…

650c_40.speaker: speaker_syndra
650c_40.dialogue: …I’m sorry. It happened so long ago, but it’s difficult to talk about.

660.speaker: speaker_noodle_bill
660.dialogue: Ramen’s ready, Miss Kai’Sa. I gave you extra fish cakes, just the way you like it.

670.speaker: speaker_kaisa
670.dialogue: Oh, wow...! This aroma...!

680.speaker: speaker_noodle_bill
680.dialogue: That’s the “Star Guardians having a personal problem” special. I came up with it, oh, three teams ago? Four? I’m old... Who can remember?

690.speaker: speaker_kaisa
690.dialogue: Four teams ago?! How many times have you served this?!

700.speaker: speaker_noodle_bill

response.dialogue: I’m going to eat this with the fury of one thousand feudal warlords.
Star Guardian noodles, huh? Alright, let's dig in!
Thanks, Bill. It was nice talking to you again.

700.dialogue: Ha! Who knows? Anyway, enjoy.

710.speaker: speaker_noodle_bill
710.dialogue: Rock on.

720.speaker: speaker_syndra
720.dialogue: The point is, Kai’Sa, that every team has problems. Some are just part of life, but others…

740.speaker: speaker_syndra
740.dialogue: Zoe and I… We had the chance to save our teammate from Fiddlesticks. But we didn’t. And in the end, that failure destroyed us.

750.speaker: speaker_kaisa
750.dialogue: So that’s why you’re really here…

760.speaker: speaker_syndra
760.dialogue: Correct. In a way… it’s to put our friends to rest. Something we should have done long ago.

770.speaker: speaker_syndra
770.dialogue: Don’t make the same mistakes we did. Not if you don’t have to.

790.speaker: speaker_syndra
790.dialogue: Ah, but it’s late. I should be going.

800.speaker: speaker_syndra
800.dialogue: I will see you when the creature surfaces, little guardian. I hope you are prepared for the fight to come.

820.speaker: speaker_kaisa
820.dialogue: Star Guardians are meant to fall, huh…?

830.speaker: speaker_kaisa
830.dialogue: Akali… No. I won’t let you.

10.speaker: speaker_fiddlesticks
10.dialogue: …Kai’Sa… Help me…

20.speaker: speaker_fiddlesticks
20.dialogue: …DON’T… LEAVE ME…

30.speaker: speaker_fiddlesticks
30.dialogue: Hhhhaaaaahhhhh… Star… Guardians…

40.speaker: speaker_syndra
40.dialogue: Hmph. Found you.

50.speaker: speaker_zoe
50.dialogue: Wahhh, it’s a big scary monster! Oh no! What will I doooo?

60.speaker: speaker_zoe
60.dialogue: OH, I REMEMBER NOW!

70.speaker: speaker_zoe
70.dialogue: I’M A MONSTER, TOO! MYAHAHAHA!

80.speaker: speaker_syndra
80.dialogue: Well, well. The power of chaos… The Twilight Star. I haven’t seen this sort of display in a while.

90.speaker: speaker_zoe
90.dialogue: ISN’T IT FUN!? I’M GONNA PAINT THE WALLS WITH THAT THING’S FACE!

100.speaker: speaker_zoe
100.dialogue: GO AHEAD, SYNDRA! THIS MONSTER KILLED HARP! TAKE OFF THE EYE PATCH AND REALLY LET LOOSE!

120.speaker: speaker_syndra
120.dialogue: Let’s see if our new friends show up, first.

130.speaker: speaker_zoe
130.dialogue: OH, BOO! BREAK OUT OF YOUR COMFORT ZONE! MYAHAHA!

140.speaker: speaker_syndra
140.dialogue: Only if I have to. You know what will happen when I do.

150.speaker: speaker_zoe
150.dialogue: KNOW?! SYNDRA, I’M COUNTING ON IT!

160.speaker: speaker_kaisa
160.dialogue: Alright, is everyone here?

170.speaker: speaker_ekko
170.dialogue: I’m here, but I want it on the record that I don’t like this.

180.speaker: speaker_taliyah
180.dialogue: Seconded. This sucks, Kai’Sa.

190.speaker: speaker_sona
190.dialogue: [“I third this.”]

200.speaker: speaker_ekko
200.dialogue: Sona thirds this.

210.speaker: speaker_sona
210.dialogue: [“She can read sign language, Ekko.”]

220.speaker: speaker_ekko
220.dialogue: I don’t know that! Where’s the annoying rat thing that’s always yelling?

230.speaker: speaker_chiizu
230.dialogue: Sob, sob… tossed aside! Left behind! Traded in like an old piece of cheese!

240.speaker: speaker_chiizu
240.dialogue: It’s hard to paint such vivid pictures with words...! Oh, my artist’s pride...!

250.speaker: speaker_kaisa
250.dialogue: Hey! Focus up! This is serious!

260.speaker: speaker_kaisa
260.dialogue: I know you’re all upset with me, but Fiddlesticks is a huge threat to the city, and a bigger threat to us.

270.speaker: speaker_kaisa
270.dialogue: This might be our only chance to stop it… even if we have to team up with someone like Zoe.

280.speaker: speaker_kaisa
280.dialogue: …Hey, where’s Akali?

300.speaker: speaker_kaisa
300.dialogue: Oh! Good. That’s… I’m glad you’re okay.

310.speaker: speaker_kaisa

response.dialogue: We’re going to save you. I promise.
Star Guardians stick together. You’re one of us.
It’s a dumb checkerboard thing, and we’re going to kick its checkerbutt.

310.dialogue: Akali… I… uh…

320a_10.speaker: speaker_akali
320a_10.dialogue: Yeah. Whatever. Let’s just kill this thing and get out of here.

320b_10.speaker: speaker_akali
320b_10.dialogue: Yeah. Whatever. Let’s just kill this thing and get out of here.

330.speaker: speaker_akali
330.dialogue: Well, meet you out there.

340.speaker: speaker_taliyah
340.dialogue: …Has Akali been getting enough sleep? She looks exhausted.

350.speaker: speaker_sona
350.dialogue: [“Something’s not right. Kai’Sa, what’s been going on?”]

360.speaker: speaker_kaisa
360.dialogue: …Fiddlesticks has been hunting Akali. I don’t know for how long.

370.speaker: speaker_kaisa
370.dialogue: But if we don’t stop it here… eventually, it’s going to kill her.

380.speaker: speaker_kaisa
380.dialogue: I… I didn’t stop it when I could have. And I didn’t tell any of you… I just… I thought I could fix it…

410.speaker: speaker_taliyah
410.dialogue: Yeah! This is the biggest monster we’ve fought so far! And I’m still pumped up from last time!

420.speaker: speaker_taliyah
420.dialogue: Round two, baby! I’m gonna punch its head!

430.speaker: speaker_sona
430.dialogue: [“We can talk it out later. For now, we fight.”]

450.speaker: speaker_kaisa
450.dialogue: Thank you. Let’s clean house.

460.speaker: speaker_kaisa
460.dialogue: Wait… What’s happening?

470.speaker: speaker_fiddlesticks
470.dialogue: …YesSSS… AlllLLL GUARdiaNSS… FaLLlll…

480.speaker: speaker_syndra
480.dialogue: Get back!

490.speaker: speaker_syndra
490.dialogue: We’re on its home turf now. It’s at the height of its power here.

500.speaker: speaker_syndra
500.dialogue: Fiddlesticks is more than any one of us can handle alone. We’ll need to attack together, or nobody’s leaving this place alive.

510.speaker: speaker_zoe
510.dialogue: SO NICE OF YOU TO JOIN US, WIDDLE STAR GUARDIAN! EVER SEEN A CHAOS DIMENSION BEFORE!?

520.speaker: speaker_zoe
520.dialogue: AS FAR AS THEY GO, THIS ONE’S NOT BAD! SHAME I HAVE TO RIP IT APART! MYAHAHA!

530.speaker: speaker_sona
530.dialogue: [“That’s her!”]

540.speaker: speaker_ekko
540.dialogue: No way… We have to fight alongside the Twilight Star…

550.speaker: speaker_taliyah
550.dialogue: I… I’ll do it! I’m not backing down!

560.speaker: speaker_kaisa
560.dialogue: Don’t worry, guardians. Remember, she’s on our side this time.

570.speaker: speaker_kaisa
570.dialogue: Akali, are you with me?

580.speaker: speaker_akali
580.dialogue: …I’ll take the rear. I was able to hide from this thing in the shadows. Might help take it off guard.

590.speaker: speaker_akali
590.dialogue: Not being seen suits me anyway.

600.speaker: speaker_ekko
600.dialogue: I’ll go with her. Just in case.

610.speaker: speaker_kaisa
610.dialogue: Alright, Ekko. Be careful. Everyone else, follow Syndra and Zoe! We fight together!

620.speaker: speaker_syndra
620.dialogue: …Heh. Brings back memories, doesn’t it?

630.speaker: speaker_zoe
630.dialogue: GYAHAHAHAHA! CHAOS REIGNS!!!

640.speaker: speaker_syndra
640.dialogue: ...Or not.

660.speaker: speaker_syndra
660.dialogue: The dark, huh? Poor choice of words!

670.speaker: speaker_zoe
670.dialogue: YOU’LL PAY FOR WHAT YOU DID TO HARP! FEED THE FLAME OF CHAOS!

680.speaker: speaker_taliyah
680.dialogue: I don’t have the flame of chaos or whatever, but I’m plenty strong enough to deal with this chess freak!

690.speaker: speaker_sona
690.dialogue: [“You made a big mistake hurting my friend. Now, it’s personal.”]

700.speaker: speaker_kaisa
700.dialogue: I won’t let you take Akali! I won’t let you hurt anyone ever again!

710.speaker: speaker_kaisa
710.dialogue: Guardians, attack!

730.speaker: speaker_kaisa
730.dialogue: Ugh… It’s too strong! We didn’t even make a dent!

740.speaker: speaker_akali
740.dialogue: Kai’Sa. That cage in the center has a familiar trapped inside. I think that’s the weak point.

750.speaker: speaker_kaisa
750.dialogue: A familiar…? Right! Once more, everyone! This time, aim for the cage!

780.speaker: speaker_akali
780.dialogue: Always wanted to say that. Not as cool as I hoped.

790.speaker: speaker_kaisa
790.dialogue: Is it… Is it finally over…?

800.speaker: speaker_akali
800.dialogue: I think so… hey, what’s that? Are you seeing that?

840.speaker: speaker_harp
840.dialogue: Zoe… It’s so good to see you again.

850.speaker: speaker_harp
850.dialogue: And you brought Syndra, too? What a reunion… I wish Gwen and Akshan could be here for this…

860.speaker: speaker_harp
860.dialogue: Seems like I’ve made a real mess of everything… Guess we should have paid more attention to those oaths…

890.speaker: speaker_kaisa
890.dialogue: Syndra, what’s going on? Is that… your old teammate?

900.speaker: speaker_syndra
900.dialogue: The fate of every guardian is to fall, Kai’Sa.

910.speaker: speaker_syndra
910.dialogue: Harp was the first, ever. She burned so brightly… brighter than anyone in the universe… but the First Star had tricked us, and soon enough, she burned away.

920.speaker: speaker_syndra
920.dialogue: We couldn’t forgive ourselves after we saw what she became. An undying monster, drawn to guardians on the edge of darkness.

950.speaker: speaker_zoe
950.dialogue: Harp! I’m sorry! I’m sorry-I’m sorry-I’m sorry!

960.speaker: speaker_zoe
960.dialogue: I tried to save all the guardians I could! I had to kill them! I couldn’t let anyone fall again!

970.speaker: speaker_zoe
970.dialogue: Harp… P-please! I was helping! You have to believe me...!

980.speaker: speaker_harp
980.dialogue: Zoe… my best friend… I’m the one who’s sorry. I thought I could keep going… but… I miscalculated… What a novice move…

1000.speaker: speaker_zoe
1000.dialogue: No! NO! I WON’T LET YOU GO!

1010.speaker: speaker_zoe
1010.dialogue: I’LL KILL EVERYONE! I’LL DESTROY EVERYTHING! YOU CAN’T LEAVE ME ALL ALONE AGAIN!

1030.speaker: speaker_harp
1030.dialogue: I will always… be your best friend… no… matter… what…

1070.speaker: speaker_zoe
1070.dialogue: …They’re fine. In your stupid city, probably.

1100.speaker: speaker_zoe
1100.dialogue: Shut up and listen to what I have to say. I’m leaving. For now, anyway.

1110.speaker: speaker_zoe
1110.dialogue: I don’t know when, but I’ll be back. And when that happens… we’re going to be enemies. You, and me, and all of them, too. I’ll kill every last one of you.

1160.speaker: speaker_syndra
1160.dialogue: All those years… Time really does fly, doesn’t it?

1170.speaker: speaker_syndra
1170.dialogue: [Hm. Myself, Zoe, Morgana, and Fiddlesticks, all in the same place… With so many powerful opponents, she won’t be able to resist the challenge.]

1190.speaker: speaker_kaisa
1190.dialogue: Wait, why? You could join us! We could protect the world together!

1200.speaker: speaker_syndra
1200.dialogue: You’ll be fine. A powerful Outer Guardian is already on her way.

1210.speaker: speaker_syndra
1210.dialogue: Putting Harp to rest was… the last thing I needed to do here. I am done now. My time as a hero has ended.

1220.speaker: speaker_akali
1220.dialogue: Hey… What are you talking about...? You protected the city from Zoe! There are plushies of you! I own, like, three!

1230.speaker: speaker_syndra
1230.dialogue: I understand your confusion, but I am part of a darker story. A… star in another sky. And it is well past time that I returned.

1240.speaker: speaker_syndra
1240.dialogue: We will also meet again, young guardians. Pray it is not soon.

1250.speaker: speaker_kaisa
1250.dialogue: What’s that supposed to mean? What aren’t you telling us?

1280.speaker: speaker_syndra
1280.dialogue: The stars are finally out, guardians… Don’t worry, my old friend will treat you well.

1290.speaker: speaker_syndra
1290.dialogue: Train them to be strong, Nilah. They will need it for the trials to come.

10.speaker: speaker_taliyah
10.dialogue: So… should we be talking about the shooting star?

20.speaker: speaker_kaisa
20.dialogue: We’ve talked about the shooting star. At length.

30.speaker: speaker_taliyah
30.dialogue: Okay, but counterpoint: I want to talk about it more.

40.speaker: speaker_ekko
40.dialogue: I agree with Tal. That thing looked a lot like a Star Guardian entering orbit.

50.speaker: speaker_sona
50.dialogue: [“I’ve never seen colors like that. Is it someone new?”]

60.speaker: speaker_ekko
60.dialogue: Sona’s asking if it’s a new guardian.

70.speaker: speaker_sona
70.dialogue: [“Thanks, Chiizu II.”]

80.speaker: speaker_ekko
80.dialogue: Hey, don’t compare me to that talking rat!

90.speaker: speaker_kaisa
90.dialogue: Honestly… I’m not sure what it was. Normally, Ina would be able to pinpoint the impact site, but with everything going on lately…

100.speaker: speaker_kaisa
100.dialogue: …Hmph. If we could just find a way to break past Morgana’s aura… As it stands, I can barely sense where any of you are.

120.speaker: speaker_ekko
120.dialogue: She’s everywhere, ’Kai. With Fiddlesticks gone, it’s like her power is enveloping the whole city. Seems like everyone’s on edge…

130.speaker: speaker_taliyah
130.dialogue: Yeah. And now we’re on meet-and-greet duty for the transfer students when we should be finding a way to stop her.

140.speaker: speaker_kaisa
140.dialogue: I know it’s not ideal, but we beat one monster. We can beat another… We just have to work together.

150.speaker: speaker_ekko
150.dialogue: …Together, huh? Where’s Akali?

160.speaker: speaker_kaisa

response.dialogue: She’s doing okay. Just recovering from the battle.
We’re not doing great. Things have been… tense.
Probably eating her body weight in noodles somewhere.

160.dialogue: Ah… that…

170a_20.speaker: speaker_kaisa
170a_20.dialogue: Fiddlesticks’ powers took a big toll on her. She’s been resting since that night.

170a_30.speaker: speaker_ekko
170a_30.dialogue: I dunno, Captain. Things seem… different. She’s barely talked to any of us.

170a_40.speaker: speaker_ekko
170a_40.dialogue: Might want to reach out when you get the chance.

170b_10.speaker: speaker_sona
170b_10.dialogue: [“Give her a little space. She might come around.”]

170b_30.speaker: speaker_sona
170b_30.dialogue: [“It’s not cute when Chiizu does it, and it’s not cute now.”]

170b_40.speaker: speaker_ekko
170b_40.dialogue: Yeesh, alright! The captain’s sign language isn’t perfect yet, but I get it.

170c_10.speaker: speaker_taliyah
170c_10.dialogue: That sounds perfectly reasonable… but she hasn’t been at Noodle Bill’s in a few days. I asked.

170c_30.speaker: speaker_taliyah
170c_30.dialogue: I-I don’t know what to do. She’s not answering her texts… and she’s really gloomy in class…

180.speaker: speaker_kaisa
180.dialogue: Strange… I know things have been tough, but with the hallucinations gone, I figured she’d snap out of her spiral.

190.speaker: speaker_kaisa
190.dialogue: We’ll have to—

200.speaker: speaker_unknown
200.dialogue: KNOCK IT OFF, JERKS!

210.speaker: speaker_unknown
210.dialogue: Rell, maybe don’t pick any fights on our first day…

220.speaker: speaker_rell
220.dialogue: C’mon, Q. They were messin’ with us first!

230.speaker: speaker_quinn
230.dialogue: We don’t want to draw more attention to ourselves.

240.speaker: speaker_rell
240.dialogue: Look I’m not gonna let them target my best friend and get away with it. I don’t care who sees.

250.speaker: speaker_quinn
250.dialogue: Ugh, this is Kiiso Middle School all over again…

260.speaker: speaker_kaisa
260.dialogue: Hello, Kiiso High transfers! My name is Kai’Sa, and…

270.speaker: speaker_rell
270.dialogue: Are you gonna bully us too?

280.speaker: speaker_quinn
280.dialogue: Don’t be like that, Rell… We should hear what they have to say.

290.speaker: speaker_rell
290.dialogue: Alright, but I’ll keep my eyes peeled for a sneak attack.

300.speaker: speaker_quinn
300.dialogue: I have a good feeling about these two. Promise.

310.speaker: speaker_rell
310.dialogue: Fine. I trust you.

320.speaker: speaker_quinn
320.dialogue: Hello, everyone. I’m Quinn, and this is Rell. We’re the Kiiso High transfer students.

330.speaker: speaker_quinn
330.dialogue: You must be the Valoran City Star Guardians.

340.speaker: speaker_kaisa
340.dialogue: W-what?!

350.speaker: speaker_taliyah
350.dialogue: O-oh, that’s not true! We’d never be… those guys...!

360.speaker: speaker_rell
360.dialogue: Relax. We’re Star Guardians too.

370.speaker: speaker_quinn
370.dialogue: I’ve been at it for about a year now, specializing in scouting and reconnaissance. Rell is new.

380.speaker: speaker_rell
380.dialogue: I’m armored cavalry… so put me right in the middle of the action!

400.speaker: speaker_kaisa
400.dialogue: Quinn, Rell, welcome to Valoran City… and welcome to the squad, I guess!

410.speaker: speaker_kaisa
410.dialogue: This is Taliyah, Sona, and Ekko. I’m Kai’Sa… and I guess you’ll have to meet Akali later.

420.speaker: speaker_kaisa
420.dialogue: Once we get better acquainted, you should know what’s going on here.

430.speaker: speaker_kaisa
430.dialogue: …We’ve been having a bit of a monster problem.

440.speaker: speaker_akali
440.dialogue: …I don’t understand. Why haven’t my visions stopped?

450.speaker: speaker_akali
450.dialogue: Everyone else is fine now… so why not me? I was there! I helped kill that stupid thing!

460.speaker: speaker_akali
460.dialogue: It’s not fair! None of this makes any sense!

470.speaker: speaker_akali
470.dialogue: Why is this happening to me? Why did I ever agree to be a Star Guardian?!

480.speaker: speaker_unknown
480.dialogue: Well, well, my dear…

490.speaker: speaker_morgana
490.dialogue: Now you’re asking the right questions.

510.speaker: speaker_akali
510.dialogue: You won’t catch me off guard this time, witch.

520.speaker: speaker_morgana
520.dialogue: In the middle of the day, no less! Little guardian, I am so very impressed with you. You’ve come a long, long way since that awful beast was stalking you.

530.speaker: speaker_akali
530.dialogue: Not long enough. I’m betting that if I kill you, my nightmares will finally stop.

540.speaker: speaker_morgana
540.dialogue: Ah, if only that were the case… but alas, I’m not responsible for those.

550.speaker: speaker_morgana
550.dialogue: I’m not here to fight you, child. I’m here to offer… some guidance.

560.speaker: speaker_akali
560.dialogue: Guidance? From you? Yeah, I don’t think so.

570.speaker: speaker_morgana
570.dialogue: …A shame about poor Harp, wasn’t it? What a shocking twist! The monster Fiddlesticks was a Star Guardian the entire time.

580.speaker: speaker_morgana
580.dialogue: I wonder… What pushed her over the edge? Was it loss? Anger? Hatred?

600.speaker: speaker_morgana

response.dialogue: Say another word and you’re a dead woman. If that’s what you even are.
That sounded like a threat. I don’t like threats.
I’m not afraid of you. You’re on a teacher’s salary.

600.dialogue: …Or did it come to her in dreams?

610a_20.speaker: speaker_morgana
610a_20.dialogue: I doubt you can handle me… but let’s test the waters a bit, shall we?

610b_20.speaker: speaker_morgana
610b_20.dialogue: I doubt you can handle me… but let’s test the waters a bit, shall we?

610c_10.speaker: speaker_morgana
610c_10.dialogue: Ugh, the state of the Valoran City education system… It almost makes an interstellar threat such as myself weep for the future.

630.speaker: speaker_morgana
630.dialogue: There it is… that old, familiar darkness...!

640.speaker: speaker_akali
640.dialogue: Ungh! Wh… what is this?! I’m… I’m...!

650.speaker: speaker_morgana
650.dialogue: You’re very special, Akali. And very lucky.

660.speaker: speaker_morgana
660.dialogue: A multitude of Star Guardians have fallen through the ages… and I’ve helped so many along the way. But you… You have a certain… knack for it.

670.speaker: speaker_morgana
670.dialogue: An excruciating enmity with your friends? Recurring night terrors? An overwhelming fear of death?! Oh, Akali! You’re perfect!

680.speaker: speaker_akali
680.dialogue: Hnnng!

690.speaker: speaker_akali
690.dialogue: Kai… why did you… let me fall...?

700.speaker: speaker_akali
700.dialogue: You… You should all… fall… with me…

710.speaker: speaker_morgana
710.dialogue: Yes! Give in, Akali! Give in to the darkness of your soul! Give in… and destroy the Star Guardians!

730.speaker: speaker_morgana
730.dialogue: Nilah!

750.speaker: speaker_akali
750.dialogue: Wh… what happened?! What did she do to me?!

760.speaker: speaker_nilah
760.dialogue: You couldn’t escape me forever, Morgana. Stand against me… and find your bliss in battle.

770.speaker: speaker_morgana
770.dialogue: […Ngh! I can’t face an Outer Guardian here! Not when I’m so close...!]

780.speaker: speaker_morgana
780.dialogue: Well… it appears you got lucky, girl.

790.speaker: speaker_morgana
790.dialogue: The legendary Nilah coming to this worthless blue dot… hmhmhm. That didn’t factor into my plans.

800.speaker: speaker_morgana
800.dialogue: We’ll have to put our duel on hold for now, Outer Guardian. Until then, Akali… I’ll be watching you.

810.speaker: speaker_nilah
810.dialogue: Ha! And just like that, she’s gone.

830.speaker: speaker_nilah
830.dialogue: …No. I’m bound to protect you and your friends. Facing Morgana is… tempting… but it is not what I promised.

840.speaker: speaker_akali
840.dialogue: What? But we’ve never even met you…

850.speaker: speaker_nilah
850.dialogue: I’ll explain later. Come. I should return you to the rest of your team.

860.speaker: speaker_nilah
860.dialogue: Heh… team. I haven’t been part of a squad in a long, long time.

870.speaker: speaker_nilah
870.dialogue: Are they good friends of yours? Capable?

10.speaker: speaker_morgana
10.dialogue: …I hope your weekend was exciting, everyone.

20.speaker: speaker_morgana
20.dialogue: I’m sure it went better for some of you than others.

40.speaker: speaker_morgana
40.dialogue: Maybe even just one of you. Not naming names… Akali.

50.speaker: speaker_kaisa
50.dialogue: Don't listen to her, Kali. She’s just mad that her plan got disrupted.

60.speaker: speaker_morgana
60.dialogue: My lesson plan, that is. And when I find out who did it, there will be consequences.

70.speaker: speaker_morgana

response.dialogue: Oh yeah? Like what?
Where’d you say you got your teaching credentials again?
Hey, Nilah. What do you think about that?

70.dialogue: …Ahem. Academic consequences, of course.

80a_10.speaker: speaker_morgana
80a_10.dialogue: A housecall, perhaps. It’s tragic, but delinquency can often be traced back to a student’s home life.

80a_20.speaker: speaker_morgana
80a_20.dialogue: It’s important that I bring any issues to the family’s attention… and, of course, take steps to correct them with each relative I come across.

80b_10.speaker: speaker_morgana
80b_10.dialogue: You doubt my credentials? I’ll have you know I’ve been doing this a long, long time.

80b_20.speaker: speaker_morgana
80b_20.dialogue: Longer than most of you have been alive. Longer than your minds can possibly comprehend.

80b_30.speaker: speaker_morgana
80b_30.dialogue: So your little school pranks won’t work. I’ve seen it all… children.

80c_10.speaker: speaker_nilah
80c_10.dialogue: I could do without the vague threats.

80c_20.speaker: speaker_morgana
80c_20.dialogue: Ah, the new third-year transfer student. Your little intervention won’t work a second time, I’m afraid.

80c_30.speaker: speaker_nilah
80c_30.dialogue: She’s right, Kai’Sa. I won’t be able to catch her off guard again. And she’s far too strong to attack directly, even for me.

80c_40.speaker: speaker_morgana
80c_40.dialogue: Sorry to say, but I hold all the cards this time.

90.speaker: speaker_morgana
90.dialogue: So remember, class… I’ll be watching you. Waiting.

100.speaker: speaker_morgana
100.dialogue: And just when you think you’ve lost… when you think you’re on the verge of defeat… when you feel like you can’t bear any more…

120.speaker: speaker_morgana
120.dialogue: I’ll spring my trap. And then the true suffering will begin.

130.speaker: speaker_kaisa
130.dialogue: Why isn’t the class reacting?! It’s like they can’t hear what she’s saying!

140.speaker: speaker_akali
140.dialogue: Her aura is too strong… They’re trapped in an illusion.

150.speaker: speaker_kaisa
150.dialogue: No way! Is the entire city like this?!

160.speaker: speaker_morgana
160.dialogue: In time, my dear. In time.

170.speaker: speaker_morgana
170.dialogue: Now, who’s ready for a pop quiz?

180.speaker: speaker_kaisa
180.dialogue: Kali, try not to let Morgana get to you. We’ll find a way to stop her.

190.speaker: speaker_akali
190.dialogue: Kai...

200.speaker: speaker_kaisa
200.dialogue: With Quinn and Rell joining us… not to mention Nilah… we’ve got enough heavy hitters on our team to take her down. You don’t have to be afraid.

210.speaker: speaker_akali
210.dialogue: I just… wish I could believe you.

220.speaker: speaker_kaisa
220.dialogue: Akali!

230.speaker: speaker_akali
230.dialogue: It’s not going to end with Morgana. After she’s gone, then who are we fighting? Syndra? Zoe?

240.speaker: speaker_akali
240.dialogue: They said they’d come back. What happens when they do?

250.speaker: speaker_kaisa
250.dialogue: Then we’ll fight them, and we’ll win.

260.speaker: speaker_akali
260.dialogue: Will we? What if it’s something even stronger than they are? Are we supposed to keep throwing ourselves at monsters until we die?

270.speaker: speaker_kaisa
270.dialogue: I… I don’t know. We just have to keep fighting… and hope one day that we’ll be safe.

290.speaker: speaker_akali
290.dialogue: They call this tree “the wishing tree.” Apparently, if you wish for something hard enough, it will grant your deepest desire…

300.speaker: speaker_akali
300.dialogue: I’ve been thinking a lot, Kai. I keep having these dreams… dreams where I die, or worse… where I turn into a monster…

310.speaker: speaker_akali
310.dialogue: I… I wish I had never joined the Star Guardians…

320.speaker: speaker_kaisa
320.dialogue: Y-you don’t mean that!

330.speaker: speaker_akali

response.dialogue: The guardians need you, Akali. I need you.
We’re in this together. Best friends forever, remember?
I never think, and it’s been working out for me.

330.dialogue: Why? Is thinking that so wrong?

340a_10.speaker: speaker_akali
340a_10.dialogue: You have a funny way of showing it.

340a_20.speaker: speaker_kaisa
340a_20.dialogue: I know I can be a little serious at times… but please… don’t say things like that…

340a_30.speaker: speaker_akali
340a_30.dialogue: I feel how I feel, Kai. That isn’t going to change.

340b_20.speaker: speaker_akali
340b_20.dialogue: Once, maybe… but you care way more about being a Star Guardian than whatever we used to be.

340b_30.speaker: speaker_kaisa
340b_30.dialogue: Is… that how you really feel?

340c_20.speaker: speaker_akali
340c_20.dialogue: I like it when you joke with me. Almost fools me into believing we’ll be okay.

340c_30.speaker: speaker_akali
340c_30.dialogue: But I know… I know that I won’t… no matter what you do…

350.speaker: speaker_kaisa
350.dialogue: Kali…

360.speaker: speaker_kaisa
360.dialogue: How about this: we spend some time together, just you and me? Hit all the spots around town, just like we used to.

370.speaker: speaker_akali
370.dialogue: Just like we used to, huh...?

380.speaker: speaker_kaisa
380.dialogue: Come on… please...?

400.speaker: speaker_akali
400.dialogue: Alright. Yeah, we can do that.

410.speaker: speaker_kaisa
410.dialogue: Really?!

420.speaker: speaker_akali
420.dialogue: I’m totally serious. No Star Guardian talk though. I don’t want to hear about fighting monsters or saving the world.

430.speaker: speaker_kaisa
430.dialogue: It’ll be hard for me, but it’s a deal.

440.speaker: speaker_akali
440.dialogue: And just you and me, okay? I want this to be a day for us.

450.speaker: speaker_akali
450.dialogue: I love everybody… You know I do. But since school started, we’ve barely been able to get some alone time.

460.speaker: speaker_akali
460.dialogue: You were my best friend, Kai… I just want to get back to that…

470.speaker: speaker_kaisa
470.dialogue: I promise we will, Kali. I promise.

480.speaker: speaker_kaisa
480.dialogue: Text me tomorrow, and I’ll meet you bright and early, alright? No excuses!

490.speaker: speaker_kaisa
490.dialogue: While I personally think it’s disgusting, I know how much you like Noodle Bill’s Breakfast Ramen.

500.speaker: speaker_akali
500.dialogue: It comes with unlimited seasoned eggs! You cannot beat that deal!

510.speaker: speaker_kaisa
510.dialogue: …I’m really glad we’re doing this, Akali. Really.

520.speaker: speaker_akali
520.dialogue: Yeah…

530.speaker: speaker_akali
530.dialogue: …me, too.

540.speaker: speaker_morgana
540.dialogue: How emotional of you. Friendship! Love! Working things out!

550.speaker: speaker_morgana
550.dialogue: It’s enough to make me vomit.

560.speaker: speaker_akali
560.dialogue: I just… couldn’t leave things the way they were.

570.speaker: speaker_morgana
570.dialogue: Of course not, my dear. You humans have always been so sentimental.

580.speaker: speaker_morgana
580.dialogue: So… are you ready? Once you begin the change, there’s no turning back.

600.speaker: speaker_akali
600.dialogue: I’m ready. Let’s do this.

10.speaker: speaker_unknown
10.dialogue: Gyoooohhhhhnnnn…!

20.speaker: speaker_unknown
20.dialogue: Gyoooohhhhhhhnnnn!

30.speaker: speaker_man
